body.name: Giant Magnetic Number of The Day Chart Paper,Dry Erase Place Value Number Line for Classroom Whiteboard Accessories,Teacher Must Have Essential Homeschool Teaching Supplies,Math Manipulative
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 2 hrs 41 mins
features: 【A Great Way to Build Number Sense】Explore numbers in a variety of different ways using this flexible magnetic paper. Simply write a number at the top of the chart and invite students to write it in word form, mark it on a number line, color it as a series of base ten blocks, split it in number bonds, and separate out the hundreds, tens and ones digits. Then just wipe the chart clean to start again! Practicing so many math skills on one reusable paper.

【Giant Size for Homeschool & Classroom】Aizweb dry erase magnetic paper measures 21.5"x17"(Consists of 2 pieces) and has huge spacing between the horizontal lines and offers plenty of space for handwriting or graphing to easily see at a distance. Great for teachers to interact in class, teach and visualize numbers, and practice math problems, which makes teaching easier and more efficient.

【Think About Numbers From Multiple Angles】Number bond activities help children practice the connection between numbers and show how different numbers can be put together to arrive at the same answer. Base 10 blocks help kids understand that a symbol (such as “124”) represents a quantity and learn place value skills. Number lines let your students make comparisons between numbers, visualize numbers, and are more comfortable talking through math problems.

【Durable & Eco-Friendly & Waterproof】Dry erase chart paper comes with a strong magnetic backing that securely adheres to any magnetic receptive surface, such as a refrigerator or magnetic white board. Smooth surface that is easy to write on and wipe clean without leaving stains. The dry-erase design and scratch-resistant laminated surface allow this product to last for years and help save time and sources.

【Perfect Gift for Teachers, Educators and Families】It's a great educational gift for teachers and kids on birthdays, Christmas, Thanksgiving, back to school, Easter, New Year, and Halloween candy bags. We strive to provide you with the best quality products and service, If you have any problem with the magnetic lined paper for the whiteboard that you purchased from us, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Great for Number Practice with One, Double or Triple Digits Double and triple-digit math can be difficult for children learning for the first time. Therefore, we worked with teachers and educators to develop this math manipulative kit. When all of these activities are repeated with different numbers, we help students learn to think about numbers in many different ways. This helps them as they learn to problem-solve and complete more complex math.

Ready for Years of Use! The magnetic Write & Wipe Mat is sturdy and bendable, it can stick to metal surfaces such as refrigerators, whiteboards, metal doors, etc. It is an excellent tool to help children develop number sense skills both in the classroom and in homeschooling and is ideal for small group work, independent practice, or learning centers. It Comes Lay Flat Protectors are installed on all four corners, plus extra thick foam protection, so It comes lay flat with no creases and wrinkles. It will fit nicely with your magnet whiteboard. Easy to Clean Using a dry sponge or cloth, even tissues can easily erase the handwriting left by dry erase markers, ensuring a fresh, clean start every time. This is a reusable math manipulation tool that can be used over and over again, even in the classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect teaching tool
reviews.reviewText: As a kindergarten teacher, my kiddos are big visual learners. Having a “paper” that is formatted just like theirs is very helpful for demonstrating. Dry erase makes for easy clean up. I also use wet erase markers on it for sentence starters.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Math Must Have
reviews.reviewText: This is my favorite math activity to do with my students! What makes it even better is that my students love it as much as I do. It magnetizes right to my whiteboard and is the perfect size- not too big and not too small. It targets a variety of math standards in a fun, concise way. I have noticed a difference in our math lessons as my students use what we do in this daily math activity and apply it to our lessons. It erases easily and cleanly, so we are able to start fresh each day. I can't say enough great things about this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this to replace my chart paper and it was just a little smaller than what I needed, but it works great for practicing writing with my students. It’s holds well to magnetic surfaces and is large enough for clear writing examples.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Much smaller than I thought. The students cannot see it from the board. I do not use it because of that. It needed to be much bigger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnet is strong.
reviews.reviewText: I love these. The magnet is very strong and this will not fall off your magnetic board. It’s a great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is one of my favorite purchases for my classroom. It wipes clean easily and comes in two pieces (great if you have half journals or full sized notebooks.) It is super helpful when modeling writing for my second graders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classroom writing mat
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it was big. One with and one without lines. Big enough for the kids to see and use.
